reviewText: Great Christmas gift - my cousin loved it.

Travis Pastrana - world champion motorcross rider & XGames Hero -- and his gang are completely nuts!  It is amazing what these guys can do without serious injury or death.  Nitro Circus videos are a must see for those interested in crazy videos and stunts.  I especially enjoy watching the "Slip-N-Bleed" clips (an extreme version of the "slip-n-slide").  Parental guidence is strongly suggested if you want your child to reach adulthood with all their limbs and brain cells.
